sqlMap.select: select order_id, order_type, payment_type, payment_id, vender_user_id, user_id, consignee_name, consignee_province, consignee_city, consignee_county, consignee_address, consignee_mobile, remark, freight_money, order_money, discount_money,discount_info, order_time, pay_time , hope_arrival_time, send_out_time ,finish_time, order_status, ip, lock_status, lock_reason, created, modified, parent_order_id ,yn from order_info where order_id = #orderId:INTEGER#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into order_info ( order_type, payment_type, payment_id, vender_user_id, user_id, consignee_name, consignee_province, consignee_city, consignee_county, consignee_address, consignee_mobile, remark, freight_money, order_money, discount_money,discount_info, order_time, pay_time ,hope_arrival_time ,send_out_time ,finish_time, order_status, ip, lock_status, lock_reason, created, modified, parent_order_id ,yn ) values (#orderType#, #paymentType#, #paymentId#, #venderUserId#, #userId#, #consigneeName#, #consigneeProvince#, #consigneeCity#, #consigneeCounty#, #consigneeAddress#, #consigneeMobile#, #remark#, #freightMoney#, #orderMoney#, #discountMoney#, #discountInfo#, now(), #payTime# ,#hopeArrivalTime#,#sendOutTime# ,#finishTime#, #orderStatus#, #ip#, #lockStatus#, #lockReason#, now(), #modified#, #parentOrderId# ,#yn# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS order_id
sqlMap.update:
update order_info set modified = now()
order_type = #orderType:INTEGER#
payment_type = #paymentType#
payment_id = #paymentId#
vender_user_id = #venderUserId:INTEGER#
user_id = #userId:INTEGER#
Consignee_name = #consigneeName:VARCHAR#
Consignee_province = #consigneeProvince:INTEGER#
Consignee_city = #consigneeCity:INTEGER#
Consignee_county = #consigneeCounty:INTEGER#
Consignee_address = #consigneeAddress:VARCHAR#
Consignee_mobile = #consigneeMobile:VARCHAR#
remark = #remark:VARCHAR#
freight_money = #freightMoney#
order_money = #orderMoney:INTEGER#
discount_money = #discountMoney:INTEGER#
discount_info = #discountInfo:VARCHAR#
order_time = #orderTime:TIMESTAMP#
send_out_time = #sendOutTime:TIMESTAMP#
finish_time = #finishTime:TIMESTAMP#
order_status = #orderStatus:INTEGER#
ip = #ip:VARCHAR#
lock_status = #lockStatus:INTEGER#
lock_reason = #lockReason:VARCHAR#
where order_id = #orderId:INTEGER#
sqlMap.select: select count(1) from order_info where order_status != 50 and order_status != 51 and user_id=#userId#

select order_id, order_type, payment_type, payment_id, vender_user_id, user_id, consignee_name, consignee_province, consignee_city, consignee_county, consignee_address, consignee_mobile, remark, freight_money, order_money, discount_money,discount_info, order_time, pay_time ,hope_arrival_time,send_out_time ,finish_time, order_status, ip, lock_status, lock_reason, created, modified, parent_order_id ,yn from order_info

select order_id, order_type, payment_type, payment_id, vender_user_id, user_id, consignee_name, consignee_province, consignee_city, consignee_county, consignee_address, consignee_mobile, remark, freight_money, order_money, discount_money,discount_info, order_time, pay_time ,hope_arrival_time,send_out_time ,finish_time, order_status, ip, lock_status, lock_reason, created, modified, parent_order_id ,yn from order_info
order by order_id desc limit #start#,#pageSize#

select order_id, order_type, payment_type, payment_id, vender_user_id, user_id, consignee_name, consignee_province, consignee_city, consignee_county, consignee_address, consignee_mobile, remark, freight_money, order_money, discount_money,discount_info, order_time, pay_time ,hope_arrival_time,send_out_time ,finish_time, order_status, ip, lock_status, lock_reason, created, modified, parent_order_id ,yn from order_info where order_status != 50 and order_status != 51 and user_id=#userId# order by order_id desc limit #start#,#pageSize#
